affinity.description: Set affinity rules for the Capsule pod

additionalSANS.description: Specify additional SANS to add to the certificate

generateCertificates.description: Specifies whether capsule webhooks certificates should be generated using cert-manager

createConfig.description: Create additionally CapsuleConfiguration even if CRDs are exclusive

exclusive.description: Only install the CRDs, no other primitives

install.description: Install the CustomResourceDefinitions (This also manages the lifecycle of the CRDs for update operations)

customAnnotations.description: Additional annotations which will be added to all resources created by Capsule helm chart

customLabels.description: Additional labels which will be added to all resources created by Capsule helm chart

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the job.

pullPolicy.description: Set the image pull policy of the helm chart job

registry.description: Set the image repository of the helm chart job

repository.description: Set the image repository of the helm chart job

tag.description: Set the image tag of the helm chart job

labels.description: Labels to add to the job.

podAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the job pod

podLabels.description: Labels to add to the job pod

podSecurityContext.description: Security context for the job pods.

securityContext.description: Security context for the job containers.

ttlSecondsAfterFinished.description: Sets the ttl in seconds after a finished certgen job is deleted. Set to -1 to never delete.

imagePullSecrets.description: Configuration for `imagePullSecrets` so that you can use a private images registry.

extraArgs.description: A list of extra arguments for the capsule controller

hostNetwork.description: Specifies if the container should be started in hostNetwork mode.  Required for use in some managed kubernetes clusters (such as AWS EKS) with custom CNI (such as calico), because control-plane managed by AWS cannot communicate with pods' IP CIDR and admission webhooks are not working

hostPID.description: Specifies if the container should be started in hostPID mode.

registry.description: Set the image registry of capsule.

repository.description: Set the image repository of capsule.

tag.description: Overrides the image tag whose default is the chart appVersion.

kind.description: Set the controller deployment mode as `Deployment` or `DaemonSet`.

livenessProbe.description: Configure the liveness probe using Deployment probe spec

allowServiceAccountPromotion.description: ServiceAccounts within tenant namespaces can be promoted to owners of the given tenant this can be achieved by labeling the serviceaccount and then they are considered owners. This can only be done by other owners of the tenant. However ServiceAccounts which have been promoted to owner can not promote further serviceAccounts.

capsuleConfiguration.description: Change the default name of the capsule configuration name

capsuleUserGroups.description: Names of the groups considered as Capsule users.

forceTenantPrefix.description: Boolean, enforces the Tenant owner, during Namespace creation, to name it using the selected Tenant name as prefix, separated by a dash

generateCertificates.description: Specifies whether capsule webhooks certificates should be generated by capsule operator

ignoreUserWithGroups.description: Define groups which when found in the request of a user will be ignored by the Capsule this might be useful if you have one group where all the users are in, but you want to separate administrators from normal users with additional groups.

logLevel.description: Set the log verbosity of the capsule with a value from 1 to 10

nodeMetadata.description: Allows to set the forbidden metadata for the worker nodes that could be patched by a Tenant

protectedNamespaceRegex.description: If specified, disallows creation of namespaces matching the passed regexp

userNames.description: Names of the users considered as Capsule users.

create.description: Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created.

existingClusterRoles.description: Specifies further cluster roles to be added to the Capsule manager service account.

existingRoles.description: Specifies further cluster roles to be added to the Capsule manager service account.

readinessProbe.description: Configure the readiness probe using Deployment probe spec

resources.description: Set the resource requests/limits for the Capsule manager container

securityContext.description: Set the securityContext for the Capsule container

volumeMounts.description: Set the additional volumeMounts needed for the Capsule manager container

volumes.description: Set the additional volumes needed for the Capsule manager container

webhookPort.description: Set an alternative to the default container port.  Useful for use in some kubernetes clusters (such as GKE Private) with aggregator routing turned on, because pod ports have to be opened manually on the firewall side

allowCrossNamespaceImport.description: Allow the Operator to match this resource with Grafanas outside the current namespace

resyncPeriod.description: How often the resource is synced, defaults to 10m0s if not set

interval.description: Set the scrape interval for the endpoint of the serviceMonitor

metricRelabelings.description: Set metricRelabelings for the endpoint of the serviceMonitor

relabelings.description: Set relabelings for the endpoint of the serviceMonitor

scrapeTimeout.description: Set the scrape timeout for the endpoint of the serviceMonitor

labels.description: Assign additional labels according to Prometheus' serviceMonitorSelector matching labels

namespace.description: Install the ServiceMonitor into a different Namespace, as the monitoring stack one (default: the release one)

nodeSelector.description: Set the node selector for the Capsule pod

podAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the capsule pod.

podLabels.description: Labels to add to the capsule pod.

podSecurityContext.description: Set the securityContext for the Capsule pod

ports.description: Set additional ports for the deployment

priorityClassName.description: Set the priority class name of the Capsule pod

replicaCount.description: Set the replica count for capsule pod

securityContext.description: Set the securityContext for the Capsule container

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account.

create.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created.

name.description: The name of the service account to use. If not set and `serviceAccount.create=true`, a name is generated using the fullname template

create.description: When cert-manager is disabled, Capsule will generate the TLS certificate for webhook and CRDs conversion.

enableController.description: Start the Capsule controller that injects the CA into mutating and validating webhooks, and CRD as well.

name.description: Override name of the Capsule TLS Secret name when externally managed.

tolerations.description: Set list of tolerations for the Capsule pod

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Set topology spread constraints for the Capsule pod

exclusive.description: When `crds.exclusive` is `true` the webhooks will be installed

mutatingWebhooksTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for mutating webhooks

name.description: Custom service name for the webhook service

namespace.description: Custom service namespace for the webhook service

port.description: Custom service port for the webhook service

url.description: The URL where the capsule webhook services are running (Overwrites cluster scoped service definition)

validatingWebhooksTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for validating webhooks
